title.narrative: The Future Cities programme supports urban development and urban mobility services in Mexico to promote safer, resilient and more sustainable cities.

description.narrative: The Future Cities Strand of the Mexico programme will support urban development in Mexico’s cities, resulting in safer, resilient and more sustainable urban mobility services for citizens, particularly for women and girls. The programme aims to tackle urban poverty through: governance and planning to improve decision-making processes and planning mechanisms for more integrated urban mobility services; and implementation of strategies tested in successful pilots to deliver sustainable urban mobility services in Mexico’s cities. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
